f45bbf0b-4acd-4166-81a6-6b407cff87ca.Statement: the primary trial is testing the effects of different gels on its study groups, whereas the secondary trial is testing different doses of the same treatment on its study group.

b23563cf-e6c4-4279-92b7-39d5e4de96d2.Statement: None of the cohort of the primary trial or the secondary trial receive enteric-coated tablets

d921df56-8a29-45a9-bb0b-66ba14dbc193.Statement: Any patients that have undergone Antineoplastic chemotherapy, Androgens, Estrogens or Progestogens therapy in the last 2 years before study entry are excluded from the primary trial.

006c9dd6-c568-4497-81b7-c954568a3b4a.Statement: Breast Cancer patients in the primary trial are administered 1000 mcg/day of talazoparib whereas Ovarian/ Peritoneal Cancer patients in the primary trial receive only 25 mcg/day talazoparib instead.

585b42d5-c81a-482a-a6bf-b7db6c6edcfb.Statement: Only 61 Cervical Cancer patients in cohort 1 of the primary trial were up to date for their screenings before the intervention.

620b6390-df07-45fe-9ef9-55a32521c740.Statement: Diarrhoea was more common for the primary trial participants than the secondary trial participants

eb088d03-7fdc-48bd-9175-0e7a9cfc7b9a.Statement: 100.0% of cohort 1 of the primary trial suffered some kind of adverse event

9334239a-f4f1-4192-a35d-93c25c41328d.Statement: the primary trial particpants receive Epacadostat twice as frequently as Sunitinib-na‚àö√òve participants in the secondary trial receive sunitinib.

feca7444-9108-45e9-b722-4f0a207376c7.Statement: Patients with a Vitamin D deficiency are excluded from the primary trial, but may be eligible for the secondary trial.

2e2a005f-232f-457a-880e-c3950bc58df6.Statement: The interventions in the primary trial and the secondary trial include completely different drug-based treatments.

b95564b8-cdbe-45d0-be91-764d6768e5f9.Statement: the primary trial candidates receive less weekly MM-121 and Paclitaxel than cohort 1 the secondary trial candidates, but higher doses of herceptin and doxatel

2ce0822a-fcf8-4010-950c-0d3a8dc2cb00.Statement: Any patients with Documented allergy to cephalosporin, trimethoprim/sulfamethoxazole, levofloxacin or celecoxib will not be eligible for both the secondary trial and the primary trial.

e6bba244-c154-4143-a5f2-5f8b1c304a97.Statement: Suspected Serious Adverse reactions were more common in the adverse events section of the primary trial than in the secondary trial.

a5657dcd-1ee5-44f6-bb21-e718259c4b2e.Statement: There were no deaths or Hospitalizations in cohort 2 of the primary trial, and only a single case of Atrial fibrillation .

8180d5e0-b284-45fe-a390-0c3a54dc663f.Statement: cohort 1 of the primary trial is given an intraosseous injection of Fluciclatide and cohort 1 of the secondary trial is administered a standard dose of Chloroquine by IV.

87fda661-4348-4078-b3e7-915893241ab0.Statement: Suramin and Paclitaxel are administered to all patients in the primary trial, and the secondary trial

4bc60955-6137-4496-b780-5fb8e90dc3ed.Statement: maculo-papular Rash was a common adverse event for the primary trial participants.

7ad6c209-8893-4a2d-963d-24666ef93a80.Statement: Both the primary trial study groups will undergo the same 18F-FDG and 18F-FPPRGD2 positron emission tomography / computed tomography (PET/CT) imaging procedures, with the exception that cohort 1 will receive a slightly higher dose of 18F-FPPRGD2.

a06166e6-12c9-49ba-ad3a-7fcfb5234174.Statement: the secondary trial and the primary trial have completely unrelated outcome measurements.

73feb437-66f3-44fd-8d9c-ab3204e6eac3.Statement: Several recorded Aes in the primary trial occurred to cohort 1 patients

927d72b0-1f55-4803-9a86-40838c08f923.Statement: the primary trial requires patients to receive 120 milligrams of denosumab injected subcutaneously every month, the secondary trial also requires injection, adminstering 0.4 to 1.0 mCi of radioactive Tc99M sulfur colloid.

19e0531d-7907-46b0-ab0c-e616746498e9.Statement: Group 2 of the primary trial recieves 0.5ug/kg of dexmedetomidine (5ml), patients in the secondary trial cohorts do not receive any Dexmedetomidine.

fc281ab7-f956-47d7-a938-8778fef1bca0.Statement: Candidates for the secondary trial study group receive 3 weekly subcutaneous (SC) injections, whereas the primary trial participants only receive a single injection at the beginning of the study.

6261a694-0407-4840-8a87-3a0c6f9dea4f.Statement: the primary trial treats one of its patient cohorts with 150 mg of oral pregabalin every 2 weeks over 6 weeks, and the secondary trial administers its patients with Depocyt and HD-MTX.

9730b1a6-e9cd-4fd6-b1e4-9916b5903c63.Statement: In total two patients from the primary trial suffered an Incidence of Dose-limiting Toxicity, 1 from each cohort.

2fb3af20-adda-4fee-860a-ce376d3a0bb2.Statement: In the primary trial results there were more patients with stable disease in week 12 than week 24, but 0 patients with complete response in week 12 or 24

f8dbd18d-2b55-4f0f-92a7-db3b1ecc3b6d.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial recorded the same total number of adverse events in their patient cohorts.

dd27a6e7-3b83-4a84-bc40-5ba39617a1c1.Statement: Patients with histologically documented metastatic or unresectable SCBC are excluded from the primary trial, unless they are positive for either ER or PR or both.

113abff0-a728-40a6-b637-8bd60a53e626.Statement: Cohort 1 of the primary trial received the same dose of Cetuximab as cohort 2, but 8mg/kg MM-121 less than cohort 2.

1cb125fb-0be1-49c6-b68b-64b525278c9c.Statement: Across both the primary trial and the secondary trial only one death was recorded in the adverse events.

fd0b22b0-c86d-4460-bf53-310901404ef5.Statement: All the primary trial candidates must have a HER2 positive tumor confirmed by either positive FISH or IHC 3+

c0151b24-14ab-4837-965d-88bb8115a560.Statement: The patient with the longest PFS in the primary trial was in cohort 1, and he survived 3.5 months without disease progression or death

1d66459b-4624-4ea0-9cda-992c4146a454.Statement: Prior treatment with gabapentin or pregabalin will result in exclusion from the secondary trial, but not from the primary trial.

73981f59-887e-4778-a78a-0bf7b7a405b7.Statement: the primary trial has 4 more adverse events recorded than the secondary trial

dbd5f70e-0fa9-4b5e-af0e-0ad9efc49bc6.Statement: There are no X-rays, ultrasound, CT scans or MRIs included the interventions of the primary trial and the secondary trial

5599d5d8-3a7b-41ce-a00c-6e0b609b618d.Statement: 100.0% of cohort 1 of the primary trial suffered at least 1 life-threatening adverse event

84942825-f636-4dcf-af2e-172012c0cc9d.Statement: cohort 1 of the primary trial recieves higher doses of Cyclophosphamide than Eribulin and cohort 2 patients receive higher doses of Cyclophosphamide than Docetaxel

e4b448ba-15ad-4cf8-9343-782d45166891.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial are studying the same drug, in different doses and with a different outcome measurement.

27aec260-8dcc-4611-8389-dc9c10d3518d.Statement: Results from the primary trial show that tamoxifen 32 mg po daily for 7 days prior to surgery and for 14 days after Breast cancer surgery reduces the diameter of tumors by 40% on average.

943f62ca-d87c-4a5e-9355-6750d7d9b58f.Statement: The dosage of Denosumab in Intervention 1 of the primary trial is 12 times higher than the dosage of Tamoxifen in intervention 1 of the secondary trial.

e53898b8-422f-4317-b2f6-c487409b0750.Statement: In total there are less cases of anemia in the primary trial than in the secondary trial.

7b819ac1-92e6-41ce-881c-0f4581a690ee.Statement: There were more cases of Infection, Asymmetry and Deflation in the primary trial than in the secondary trial.

c09c08d5-189f-4e15-acb8-2c3cb235aaa6.Statement: The same number of Aes were reported for both cohorts in the primary trial

99a6cb19-b6d8-4cb7-84e1-be559854caa6.Statement: All patients in the primary trial receive at least 20mg of MCS110 every 3 weeks.

70539b18-50b0-43f7-b676-2143de2dc3e8.Statement: the primary trial and the secondary trial both administer cyclophosphamide to their patient cohorts

52b055fd-9e0d-41ad-9eb7-1a724cbc0112.Statement: There were no significant differences in the results from the groups in the primary trial, however some differences where found between the Reflexology Group and control group results in the secondary trial.

dcfc0053-b963-4542-ae02-228d3d2bd98e.Statement: The Interventions in the primary trial included different medications but are administered through the same routes.

f706897d-d54e-4449-8bc7-da0bd6fbad01.Statement: candidates with an ECOG score of 1 are eligible for both the primary trial and the secondary trial

c39ec45a-1664-49aa-8356-abbecf045001.Statement: over 97% of patients in the secondary trial and the primary trial did not suffer any adverse events

eb555e01-0a12-45a1-99ad-7d7dafbe8912.Statement: Cohort A and B of the primary trial are administered the same Two IM injections of LD V935, at the same point in the cycle.

c43583e4-da5f-42b3-ad3d-7ba8b6b28f2b.Statement: the secondary trial recorded 11 more cases of Intestinal perforation than the primary trial

094e7aec-88db-4ad0-b995-ece8587fd48b.Statement: There are no X-rays, transendocardial injections,  CT scans or MRIs included the interventions of the primary trial and the secondary trial

20c98ba5-ca61-4afe-af57-6de08705a5cd.Statement: the secondary trial and the primary trial use different outcome measurements and units of measure.

58fa0ef4-0355-42bc-8378-fef98752b05e.Statement: Patients in the primary trial will receive higher doses of Alpha Lipoic Acid throughout the study duration, up to a maximum of 100 mg three times daily, whereas, patients in cohort 1 of the secondary trial receive the same dose of Necitumumab for the entire duration of the trial.

b033d45a-c039-42de-a073-3c051c6f1e3c.Statement: Over 1/2 patients in the primary trial treated with Lapatinib 1000 mg + Nab-Paclitaxel experienced either a confirmed complete response (CR) or a confirmed partial response (PR).

75c55f70-aa52-4794-aae7-3a355f1a76e9.Statement: Breast cancer patients with estrogen negative, progesterone negative and HER2- tumors are eligible for the primary trial

070ba2da-932a-4a62-861e-3f2c89630b4d.Statement: Most the primary trial candidates suffered from some kind of eating disorder during the study duration

76d498ce-037c-4f7e-8cbb-450d8f6019ec.Statement: patients of any gender can be eligible for both phases of the primary trial if they have evidence of a solid tumor that is locally advanced and/or metastatic.

dfd8e736-5ef2-4d36-b124-9382e72f982d.Statement: the primary trial patients in The paced respiration intervention group experienced fewer Hot flashes per day on average than patients in the The fast, shallow respiration group.

a4a2c0ba-3fa9-4fad-9258-7e517ae85e25.Statement: alcoholic patients are excluded from the primary trial but may be eligible for the secondary trial if they drink less than 5 alcoholic drinks a day.

e8e3fedb-075d-440e-bf2e-baec76f96cca.Statement: Patients with a histologically/cytologically confirmed diagnosis of a Non-small cell lung cancer or Small cell lung cancer are eligible for the primary trial

b53a2698-dfb0-416d-9f3e-2e800a360b3e.Statement: the primary trial treats one of its patient cohorts with 150 mg of oral pregabalin twice daily, and the secondary trial administers its patients with Depocyt and HD-MTX.

cd067ee2-ed1d-403b-aa50-d61a3399fda3.Statement: after a month of TAK-228 Plus Tamoxifen treatment patients in the primary trial experienced a 10% reduction in the Percentage of cells with Ki67 expression

8b50bdc1-1722-403b-a854-adeaacd02acb.Statement: Patients with a history of severe anaphylactic reactions to herceptin, or a history of non-response to herceptin treamtents are eligible for the primary trial.
